newsitem.title: PANAMA: Panama ship traffic continues despite sunk tug.
newsitem.headline: Panama ship traffic continues despite sunk tug.

text.p: Ship traffic continued through the Panama Canal on Thursday despite a sunken tug, said an employee for the Canal Authority Zone.
Earlier, crude oil traders in California said the sunken tug could disrupt traffic for up to a week. Traffic includes a heavy flow of tankers bringing South American oil to refiners in California.
"It was a tug that capsized and sank. It is not blocking traffic," the employee said, declining further comment.
